pages.text: Bronze can be made by smelting Bronze Blend in a blasting furnace.$(br)$(br)It can be crafted into a variety of decorative blocks, tools, as well as upgrade golden armour into Corinthian Bronze.
Bronze Blend can be made by grinding 5 copper and 1 tin in a mortar.$(br)$(br)It can only be smelted in a Blasting Furnace.
